name: 快速炼丹数据集生成
description: AI-toolkit训练数据集（多角度/场景/姿势）
steps: Front view, standing pose, neutral expression, white background, maintain character consistency
Side view profile, standing pose, looking forward, white background, maintain character consistency
Back view, standing pose, white background, maintain character consistency
Three-quarter view, slight smile, indoor setting with soft lighting, maintain character consistency
Close-up portrait, detailed facial features, natural lighting, maintain character consistency
Full body shot, walking pose, outdoor urban environment, maintain character consistency
Sitting pose, relaxed posture, indoor casual setting, maintain character consistency
Action pose, dynamic movement, plain background, maintain character consistency
Top-down view bird eye angle, centered composition, minimal background, maintain character consistency
Low angle view, confident pose, dramatic lighting, maintain character consistency
